sentences.sContent: “We have to hold on here, ” said Saheer al-Saidi, a militiaman speaking at rebel command post inside the town that afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: “We have to hold on here, ” said Saheer al-Saidi, a militiaman speaking at rebel command post inside the town that afternoon.
sentences.sCn: “我们必须守住这里”，民兵组织成员萨赫尔.阿尔萨义迪这天下午在该市中心的叛军司令部表示。
